704150.name: BLUE REFLECTION: Season Pass
704150.description:
This is a season pass for BLUE REFLECTION.
Get the over 60 costumes and a special event at a discount price!

Contents included:

BLUE REFLECTION: Sailor Swimsuits Complete Set
BLUE REFLECTION: Arland Maid Costume for Yuzu
BLUE REFLECTION: Arland Maid Costume for Lime
BLUE REFLECTION: Summer Outing Complete Set
BLUE REFLECTION: Bath Towels Complete Set
BLUE REFLECTION: Vacation Style Complete Set
BLUE REFLECTION: Special Event

*All of the contents included in this Season Pass will be released by end of November 2017.
704150.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
